data.title: Lavender Marriages of the 21st century! - Page 3
data.meta_description: There is a VERY long running lavender marriage that is one of the most famous in Hollywood.
data.text:
There is a VERY long running lavender marriage that is one of the most famous in Hollywood.

A certain blue eyed hustler who like dressing salads & his "wife" who could be The Equalizers sister.

0

diddlypi wrote:

There is a VERY long running lavender marriage that is one of the most famous in Hollywood.

A certain blue eyed hustler who like dressing salads & his "wife" who could be The Equalizers sister.

Got a little snippet on him. In the 60s my grandma was staying in a hotel and always took her dog everywhere. The salad dresser stopped her on the stairs one day to say "What beautiful eyes your dog has." It always made us laugh when he was saving the souls from the fire in that movie and my grandma would pipe up "Lovely man and he thought our Cookie had beautiful eyes".

0

diddlypi wrote:

There is a VERY long running lavender marriage that is one of the most famous in Hollywood.

A certain blue eyed hustler who like dressing salads & his "wife" who could be The Equalizers sister.

I am sorry I just can't believe that ,if thats true then I am not sure I can even believe the sun rises in the east ::: runs away sobbing ::::

0

Ahh...sorry to spoil you illusions.

Whilst filming he is said to have had an affair with the small closeted A lister. You know the one i mean, the one who has just "fathered" a child.

I am sorry I just can't believe that ,if thats true then I am not sure I can even believe the sun rises in the east ::: runs away sobbing ::::

ashley85 wrote:

Reese Witherspoon and Ryan Phillipe

To slightly contradict myself but isn’t he ^ known/rumoured/alleged etc to have previously been, hmm how do I put this, a high class r****** before he made it as an actor?!

And maybe the lavender marriage rumours come from this but that doesn’t necessarily make him not straight? It’s just a job after all!

0

diddlypi wrote:

There is a VERY long running lavender marriage that is one of the most famous in Hollywood.

A certain blue eyed hustler who like dressing salads & his "wife" who could be The Equalizers sister.

Just don't believe this one!! It would be impossible to keep it a secret all these years...think rumours start when very handsome men marry girls who are more homely looking..but they have had one of the strongest marriages in showbiz (30+ years?) - something would have come out by now.....surely?!

0

but isn’t he ^ alleged etc to have previously been, hmm how do I put this, a high class ******* before he made it as an actor?!

And maybe the lavender marriage rumours come from this but that doesn’t necessarily make him not straight? It’s just a job after all!

But that blind item as :eek: as it was lol, doesn't it make you think that they're more likely to have been lavender, it's just a job ok but it's seems more of a job for someone on the other team!

Mrs C wrote:

Just don't believe this one!! It would be impossible to keep it a secret all these years...think rumours start when very handsome men marry girls who are more homely looking..but they have had one of the strongest marriages in showbiz (30+ years?) - something would have come out by now.....surely?!

I don't believe it either. If I felt like it, I could decide to post that Richard and Judy were in a lavender marriage. It wouldn't be true - I would have completely made it up - but people would read it, some might believe it, and suddenly a rumour would have started.

I don't believe it either. If I felt like it, I could decide to post that Richard and Judy were in a lavender marriage. It wouldn't be true - I would have completely made it up - but people would read it, some might believe it, and suddenly a rumour would have started.

To believe thats the salad dresser was in a lavender marriage I would have to see him actually in the act with my own eyes even a film of it wouldn't sway me ,there is no way. Richard and judy however

josieharris wrote:

Iv got to ask sorry, what does beard mean? by reading different posts i think it means "hiding behing something" am i right? i love reading this site but get stuck a lot

In this context I think it means the wife of a man who only married her to disguise the fact that he was in fact homosexual
